Package ohos.ivihardware.vehiclecontrol

Class VehicleConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.ivihardware.vehiclecontrol.VehicleConfigurationManager

  • public class VehicleConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides interfaces to obtain vehicle information.

    The vehicle information includes the vehicle ID and configurations, including the size, transmission, configuration, and identification numbers.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Ivi.VehicleControl

                                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                      ohos.rpc.RemoteException,
                                                                      java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Obtains the vehicle fuel type.
        Returns:
        Returns the fuel type, which can be gasoline, methanol, ethanol, diesel, or electric, as defined in FuelType.
        Throws:

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a parameter value is invalid.
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if an IPC error occurs.

        public static VehicleConfigurationManager.RefuelPosition getVehiclereFuelPosition​()
                                                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                                  ohos.rpc.RemoteException,
                                                                                  java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Obtains the position of the fuel cover or charge port.
        Returns:
        Returns the position of the fuel cover or charge port, which can be front_left, front_right, middle_left, middle_right, rear_left, rear_right, or unknown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Throws this exception if the signal is unavailable.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a parameter value is invalid.
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if an IPC error occurs.

      • getVehicleSteeringWheelConfiguration

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Short> getVehicleSteeringWheelConfiguration​()
                                                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                                                   ohos.rpc.RemoteException,
                                                                                   java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Obtains the vehicle steering wheel configurations.
        Returns:
        Returns the steering wheel configurations, including the steering wheel column tilt (0% for the lowest position and 100% for the highest position), the steering wheel angle (a positive value indicates the angle to the left, and a negative value indicates the angle to the right, and the extension of the steering wheel from the dashboard (0% for the position closest to the dashboard and 100% for the position farthest from the dashboard).
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Throws this exception if the signal is unavailable.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a parameter value is invalid.
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if an IPC error occurs.
        Since:
        1

      • getVehicleACRISS

        public static java.lang.String getVehicleACRISS​()
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                ohos.rpc.RemoteException,
                                                java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Obtains the car classification code of the car rental company. The code is in compliance with the Association of Car Rental Industry Systems Standards (ACRISS).
        Returns:
        Returns the car classification code of the car rental company.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Throws this exception if the signal is unavailable.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if a parameter value is invalid.
        ohos.rpc.RemoteException - Throws this exception if an IPC error occurs.
        Since:

      • getDriverZone

        public static VehicleConfigurationManager.DriverPosition getDriverZone​()
        Obtains the driver's position in the cabin.
        Returns:
        Returns the driver's position in the cabin, either DriverPosition.FRONT_LEFT or DriverPosition.FRONT_RIGHT, as enumerated in DriverPosition.
